description:
These versatile, high-mobility bib pants are equipped with articulated knee pads. Super-comfortable when kneeling in the boat or back on shore. Mustang Survival chose a 3-layer waterproof-breathable fabric that's light, yet durable enough to stand up to sand and salt water.

  • 3-layer MarineSpec SP waterproof-breathable fabric is designed for salt-water environments
  • Durable Cordura® seat and knee panels resist abrasion
  • Water-resistant YKK Aquaguard® side zipper makes getting on and off easy
  • Removable, lightweight moulded knee pads stay put with knee adjustment tabs
  • Low profile pockets offer easy access to essentials
name: Mustang Survival Taku Bib Pants - Women's
